1.0.name: wordpress/smart-google-code-inserter
1.0.description: This plugin makes it easy for you to add your Google Analytics tracking code as well as your meta tag verification of Webmaster Tools. NEW - Now you are able to add your Google AdWords conversion tracking code and select a list of pages from a dropdown to choose which page you want the code to be placed on (e.g. a thank you page).
